com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface CredentialEvent

public interface CredentialEvent

Interface to be used by credential clients for passing parameters of credential-related errors to the server.

Instances of this interface should be created through one of the event factory services. CleartextCredentialService.createEvent(Credential)

Credential events can be submitted to the server via the CleartextCredentialService.notifyEvent(CredentialEvent) method.

Method Summary

Method Detail

setErrorCode

void setErrorCode(java.lang.String errorCode)
Sets a well-known code of this event.

Each error code has a potentially localizable message that describes the error. The messages are managed by the server. Clients do not need to concern themselves with message texts as long as they provide adequate parameters based on the error code.

Error code are documented separately.

Parameters:
errorCode - a well-known error code.

setMessage

void setMessage(java.lang.String description)
Sets a plain text message describing the root cause of this error.

This parameter is optional.

Parameters:
description - root cause description text.

setPolicyId

void setPolicyId(java.util.UUID policyId)
Sets the ID of the policy associated with this error.

This parameter may be required depending on the error code.

Parameters:
policyId - credential policy ID
See Also:
CredentialPolicy.getId()

setProperty

void setProperty(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String value)
Sets extra parameters that may be required for properly rendering the error message associated with the provided error code.

The format for these properties is very free form and depend on the application itself. The names of commonly used properties can be found in CredentialEventProperties.

Parameters:
name - of property or tag
value - of property or tag

setSeverity

void setSeverity(Credential.EventSeverity severity)
Sets the severity of this event

Parameters:
severity - value
